If you have any questions about our facility or programs, please use the contact form and we will get back to you as soon as you can! You can also email us at info@excellentice-kirkland.com or call us at 514-695-4368 . Administrative Hours Monday – Friday 8:00AM – 4:00PM Located in Kirkland, QC Want to know more? How to reach us By phone Front desk: Phone: 514-695-4368 Fax: 514-426-4539 On the map 2950 rue Edmond Kirkland, QC H9H 5J5 Send a message General inquiries: Info@excellentice-kirkland.com Facebook X Instagram Home About Contact Us Privacy Policy Refund Policy How to reach us 2950 Edmond Kirkland, QC. Description This Sarasota gun show is held at Robarts Arena
 and hosted by 2 Guys Shows. All federal, state and local firearm 
ordinances and laws must be obeyed. The Arena Group – Where the Action is About Us Our Brands Leadership Investors Careers Press Contact Search The Arena Group – an innovative media and technology company – is home to many of the most iconic and passionate media brands . Each month we connect over 100 million people with interests they love, enriching their experiences through like-minded communities, all while offering diverse storytelling and trusted recommendations. See all Your audience, at scale . Our brand safe content reaches consumers in an engaging way on each step of their journey. Our data and addressability allow us to provide our partners with a specific and holistic plan that delivers business results: Audience Targeting Proprietary technology leveraging our fully addressable inventory to curate segments that connect advertisers to consumers in key moments. Commerce Audience-led e-commerce by using an array of signals from our data to maximize effectiveness. Branded Content & Sponsorship We craft inspiring stories and bring our media brands to life, connecting partners with authentic, passionate audiences online and through impactful IRL experiences. Display Advertising Direct, Programmatic Guaranteed, PMP, Open Exchange. We connect our partners with our authentic, passionate and fully addressable audience in key moments. Our industry-leading and proprietary user management platform optimizes brand impact at every step of the purchase funnel, building lasting relationships. Latest News August 25, 2025 The Arena Group to Participate in the Lake Street 2025 BIG9 Conference Read More August 14, 2025 The Arena Group Posts 67% Revenue Growth with Record Profits Read More July 31, 2025 The Arena Group Authorizes Share Repurchase Program Read More See all Contact media@thearenagroup.net 200 Vesey Street, 24th floor, New York, NY 10281 About Us Our Brands Leadership Investors Careers Press Terms of Use Privacy Policy © 2025 The Arena Group Holdings, Inc . CA Day 2024 skip to main content Search Website Search Sign up for email updates from Sarasota County Agricultural Fair Assoc. Email Get Updates Tickets About Us Welcome Board of Directors Livestock Committee Creative Arts Committee Contact / Directions Events Event Calendar Consumer Show Social Concerts Trade Shows Show Sports Circus Fair Event Results Itinerary Fair Sarasota Fair Livestock Shows Exhibitor Add-On Form Livestock Committee 2026 Steer and Swine Buyer Information Creative Arts Commerical Exhibit Information Fair Map Entertainment Admission & Hours Food Vendor Information Facebook Twitter Photo Gallery Get Updates Facility Rentals Robarts Arena Potter Building Ken Clark Building Fairgrounds Skip Navigation Links Events > Consumer Show > CA Day 2024 CA Day 2024 Date: Apr 09, 2024 About: WELCOME TO THE CAI WEST FLORIDA CHAPTER! Our mission is to provide education, tools and resources promoting the highest standards among managers, business partners, homeowners and board members for the benefit of all community associations in the Sarasota, Manatee and DeSoto Counties. Our membership includes condominium, cooperative, and homeowner associations as well as manager members and those who provide services and products to associations. As one of the most active chapters in the nation, we have greater than 1000 members! Community Associations Institute: National Organization Our mission is to inspire professionalism, effective leadership and responsible citizenship. of Transcript Location(s): Robarts Arena Category(s): Consumer Show View Itinerary Be A Fan Official Site: https://www.caiwestflorida.org/site_home.cfm 1 of 1 Upload of Transcript Home | About Us | Events | Fair | Facility Rentals | Contact | Site Map | Privacy, Terms & Cookies | Purchase Policy Contact Us 941.365.0818 info@sarasotafair.com 3000 Ringling Blvd. Sarasota, FL 34237 Copyright ©2025, Sarasota County Agricultural Fair Assoc.. Sarasota County Fairgrounds & Robarts Arena - All Music Magazine Logout Search Search News Reviews Album Reviews Concert Reviews Interviews Galleries Podcasts Editorials Videos Contact News Reviews Album Reviews Concert Reviews Interviews Galleries Podcasts Editorials Videos Contact Festivals Contributors Advertising Festivals Contributors Advertising Venues Edit Venue Details Add Upcoming Show Reset Password Sarasota County Fairgrounds & Robarts Arena Sarasota Blues , Funk , Rock (941) 365-0818 info@sarasotafair.com View Website 3000 Ringling Blvd Sarasota Florida 34237 Smoking About The Venue Sarasota Fairgrounds, Robarts Arena, Potter Building, Ken Clark Auditorium The Sarasota Fairgrounds offers a variety of facilities for use for small to large functions. Robarts Arena, Ken Clark Auditorium, and the Potter Building will accommodate meetings, weddings, reunions, trade shows, craft fairs, sporting events or concerts. The building’s maximum capacities range from 150, 299 to 5,000. The expansive 65 acre complex also boasts RV rallies, Suncoast Renaissance Festival, and other outdoor activities. The annual Sarasota County Fair is held annually in March. Upcoming Events: No events yet, check back later! Contact Us © 2025 All Music Magazine. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy

The building's 15,000 square foot floor  provides room for a variety of sporting events, home shows, banquets, gun shows, concerts, graduations and more. The maximum capacity for the building is 4845 depending on the floor configuration.  The newly renovated chair seating holds 2,696 with hand rails and photo-glo strips on the stairs for extra safety.  It features a box office,  remodeled bathrooms, renovated concessions, two renovated locker rooms, and the site provides ample parking. For more information, please contact our office to schedule a meeting to discuss your event.
